ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( LZ_BIT_SO__c = TRUE, Account.Product__r.Name <> "Business Tax Preparation", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Basic (Finance)", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Basic (Full)", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Basic (Half)", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Basic (Q)", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Basic + Est. Tax", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Basic + Est. Tax (Finance)", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Basic + Est. Tax (Half)", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Basic + Est. Tax (Q)", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Pro", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Pro (Finance)", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Pro (Half)", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Pro (Q)", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Pro + Est. Tax", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Pro + Est. Tax (Finance)", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Pro + Est. Tax (Half)", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Pro + Est. Tax (Q)", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Annual Business & Personal Tax Prep 2015", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Annual Business Tax Prep 2015", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Form 1023 for Nonprofit", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Neat Receipts: Business Tax Prep - Free 2014 for New Business", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Nonprofit Tax Prep and Tax Consulting", Account.Product__r.Name <> "Business Tax Prep, Tax Consulting" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: 2 BIT Customer - Can't choose this product
